cards.name: Alicia Spinnet
cards.description: If there is a Match in play, whenever 1 of your cards that needs Quidditch Power does damage, it does 1 more damage.
cards.flavorText: '... A penalty to Gryffindor, taken by Spinnet, who puts it away, no trouble ...' — Lee Jordan, commentator

cards.name: Aragog
cards.description: To play this card, discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play. Whenever another of your Spiders does damage, it does 2 more damage.
cards.flavorText: 'A traveler gave me to Hagrid when I was an egg. Hagrid was only a boy, but he cared for me ...' — Aragog

cards.name: Armando Dippet
cards.description: At the end of each of your turns, if you played a Gryffindor, Hufflepuff, Ravenclaw, or Slytherin card, you may draw a card or do 2 damage to an opponent.

cards.name: Cancelled Exams
cards.description: Choose an opponent. On their next turn, they gain 1 more Action. On your next turn, you gain 2 more Actions.
cards.flavorText: '... the exams had been canceled as a school treat ...'

cards.name: Chamber of Secrets
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.description: Cards cannot be played from or leave their owners' discard piles.
cards.flavorText: 'Naturally, the school has been searched for evidence of such a chamber ... It does not exist.' — Professor Binns

cards.name: Dobby
cards.description: During each opponent's turn, you may prevent up to 4 damage done to you. If any damage is prevented in this way, at the end of that turn, that opponent may choose a non-Healing card in play other than Dobby. Return that card to its owner's hand.
cards.flavorText: 'The little creature on the bed had large, bat-like ears and bulging green eyes the size of tennis balls.'

description.effect: Your opponent may use Actions only to draw or play cards.
description.toSolve: Your opponent uses Actions to play cards 4 times.
description.reward: Your opponent may choose 1 of your Characters in play. Their starting Character gains the abilities of the chosen Character until the end of their turn.

cards.name: Drawing the Sword
cards.description: Play this card only if you have a Gryffindor Witch or Wizard in play. Do 6 damage divided as you choose among any number of Creatures.
cards.flavorText: 'Only a true Gryffindor could have pulled that out of the hat, Harry.' — Albus Dumbledore

cards.name: Dueling Club
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.description: At the end of each player's turn, if that player used an Action to play a Spell, they draw a card.
cards.flavorText: 'I wouldn't mind dueling lessons; they might come in handy one of these days ...' — Seamus Finnigan

cards.name: Dumbledore's Suspension
cards.note: Play this card only if you have at least 4 Lessons in play.

description.effect: Your opponent's starting Character loses all abilities (including any Lessons provided).
description.toSolve: Your opponent skips a total of 3 Actions.
description.reward: The next Spell your opponent plays needs 2 less Power to play.

cards.name: Immobulus
cards.description: Choose an opponent. During their next turn, prevent all damage done to you by their Creatures. Until the beginning of your next turn, if one of their Creatures takes damage, discard that Creature.

cards.name: Katie Bell
cards.description: If there is a Match in play, whenever a card (yours or an opponent's) does damage to you, it does 1 less damage.
cards.flavorText: '... nice dive around Flint, up off the field ...' — Lee Jordan, commentator

cards.name: Loyalty's Reward
cards.description: Choose 5 non-Healing cards, of different types, in your discard pile. Your opponent chooses 1 of those cards. Put that card on the bottom of your deck and the rest into your hand. (You must choose 5 cards.)

cards.name: Lucius' Cane
cards.description: At the end of each of your turns, do 2 damage to your opponent for each Action you have used after the second Action. (If you play this card, and you already have a Wand in play, discard the old one.)

cards.name: Lucius Malfoy
cards.description: At the end of each of your turns, if you have used 5 or more Actions, you may search your deck, take any card, put it into your hand, and then shuffle your deck.
cards.flavorText: 'The man ... could only be Draco's father. He had the same pale, pointed face and identical cold, gray eyes.'

cards.name: Millicent Bulstrode
cards.description: Once per turn, you may use an Action to do 1 damage to an opponent's Creature.
cards.flavorText: 'She was large and square and her heavy jaw jutted aggressively.'

cards.name: Moaning Myrtle
cards.description: Once per game, you may choose an opponent's card in play. If the chosen card is discarded from play, do 8 damage to that opponent.

cards.name: Muddled Memories
cards.description: Look at an opponent's hand. You may choose 1 of those cards. If you do, on their next turn, they must use their first Action(s) to play that card. (If your opponent cannot play that card, this ability has no effect.)
cards.flavorText: 'I think I'm the one attacking everyone, Tom!'” — Ginny Weasley

cards.name: Polyjuice Potion
cards.description: To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. Choose 1 of an opponent's Wizards or Witches in play. Your starting Character gains all abilities of that card until the end of your turn.

cards.name: Prof. Gilderoy Lockhart
cards.description: At the end of each player's turn, if you have discarded a card from your hand, choose an opponent. They discard a card from their hand.
cards.flavorText: 'Fame's a fickle friend, Harry ... Celebrity is as celebrity does. Remember that.' — Professor Gilderoy Lockhart

cards.name: Slytherin's Basilisk
cards.description: To play this card, discard 2 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play. At the end of each of your turns, you may choose 1 of an opponent's Characters or Creatures in play and put a petrification counter on it. Cards with petrification counters lose all abilities and do no damage. When this card leaves play, remove all petrification counters from play.

cards.name: Swallowed Snitch
cards.description: During your turn, if your hand contains at least 4 cards, you may discard this card from play. If you do, discard your hand to win the current Match.

cards.name: Tom Marvolo Riddle
cards.description: Once during each of your turns, when you play a Lesson, you may choose a Lesson type. Until the end of your turn, this card provides 1 Power of the chosen type.
cards.flavorText: 'Brilliant. Of course, he was probably the most brilliant student Hogwarts has ever seen.' — Albus Dumbledore

cards.name: Wandering Knockturn
cards.note: Play this card only if you have at least 5 Lessons in play.

description.effect: After your opponent uses an Action to play a Creature or Item, they discard that card from play.
description.toSolve: Your opponent discards 2 cards in this way.
description.reward: Your opponent may put up to 2 Lessons from their discard pile into play.

cards.name: Aragog's Lair
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.description: Each Spider has 2 more Health (even your opponents').
cards.flavorText: 'Aragog clicked his pincers furiously, and all around the hollow the sound was echoed by the crowd of spiders ...'

cards.name: Arania Exumai
cards.description: Do 2 damage to a Creature of your choice. Then do 3 damage to all Spider Creatures (even your own).
cards.flavorText: 'Even as he reached for his wand, Harry knew it was no good, there were too many of them ...'

cards.name: Basilisk Fang
cards.description: When you play this card, do 2 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice. You may use an Action to discard this card from play. If you do, choose an opponent's Item in play and discard it.

cards.name: Bowtruckle
cards.description: When another of your Plants takes damage, this card deals 1 damage to an opponent of your choice.
cards.flavorText: 'I just happen to have met several of these exotic plants on my travels ...' — Professor Gilderoy Lockhart

cards.name: Break with a Banshee
cards.description: During your turn, you may discard this card from play. If you do, choose a non-Healing Match with printed Power cost of 1 in your discard pile. Play it as if it were in your hand. (You must still use an Action to play the card.)

cards.name: Circling the Goal Posts
cards.description: Do 3 damage to an opponent. Then draw a card. At the end of each of your turns, if this card is in your discard pile and a Spell did at least 5 damage to an opponent, you may discard a card from your hand to put this card into your hand.

cards.name: Cornish Pixie
cards.description: When you play this card, look at an opponent's hand. You may choose a card and place it under this card. (Cards under this card cannot be interacted with.) When this card leaves play, return that card to its owner's hand.

description.effect: Whenever a card is discarded from play, your opponent says, 'Rest in peace.' If your opponent forgets, they take 3 damage at the end of the turn.
description.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 3 Lessons in their hand and discards them.
description.reward: Your opponent may look at your hand. They may choose 1 of those cards and discard it.

cards.name: Draco's Superiority
cards.description: Search your deck. You may take a Broom from your deck, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. If that card's printed Power cost is at least 5, do 5 damage to an opponent.
cards.flavorText: 'Everyone's just been admiring the brooms my father's bought our team.' — Draco Malfoy

cards.name: Essential Knowledge Test
cards.description: Whenever you would draw a card, except during your draw step, you may choose not to.

cards.name: Gadding with Ghouls
cards.description: During your turn, you may discard this card from play. If you do, choose a non-Healing Item with printed Power cost of 2 or less in your discard pile. Play it as if it were in your hand. (You must still use an Action to play the card.)

cards.name: Hogwarts Pipes
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.description: When any player takes damage, they discard cards from the bottom of their deck instead of the top.
cards.flavorText: 'But how's the basilisk been getting around the place?' — Ron Weasley

cards.name: Holidays with Hags
cards.description: You may use an Action and discard this card from play. If you do, put up to 2 Lessons of the same type from your discard pile into play.

cards.name: Kheshakhassa
cards.description: To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. Search your deck. You may take a Location that needs Potions Power with printed Power cost 5 or less from your deck and put it into play. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Lockhart's Office
cards.note: When you play this card, discard any other Location from play (yours or your opponent's).
cards.description: Once during each player's turn, that player may discard any number of cards from their hand.
cards.flavorText: 'Shining brightly on the walls by the light of many candles were countless framed photographs of Lockhart.'

cards.name: Magical Me
cards.description: During your turn, you may discard this card from play. If you do, choose a non-Healing Spell with printed Power cost of 2 or less in your discard pile. Play it as if it were in your hand. (You must still use an Action to play the card.)

cards.name: Mandrake Draught
cards.description: Choose 1 of your Characters in play that has a 'Once per turn' ability that you have already used this turn. Use that ability again without using any Actions.

cards.name: Quidditch Plaque
cards.description: Whenever you play a Seeker, Beater, Keeper, or Chaser Character, you use up 1 Action to play it instead of 2. During your turn, you may discard this card from play. If you do, put a non-Healing Seeker, Beater, Keeper, or Chaser from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Skurge
cards.description: Choose 2 of your non-Healing cards in play of different card types (other than your starting Character). Discard 1 of them and return the other to your hand.

cards.name: Spellotape
cards.description: If you would discard another Item from play due to an opponent's card, discard this card instead.

cards.name: Vera Verto
cards.description: Choose a Creature in play. It becomes an Item that has no abilities, damage each turn, health, or keywords (except Unique) while it is in play.

cards.name: Voyages with Vampires
cards.description: During your turn, you may discard this card from play. If you do, choose a Creature with printed Power cost 2 or less in your discard pile. Play it as if it were in your hand. (You must still use an Action to play the card.)

description.effect: Before each of your opponent's turns, they reveal the top card of their deck. You may take 1 damage to put that card on the bottom of their deck.
description.toSolve: Your opponent puts their hand on the bottom of their deck in any order.
description.reward: Your opponent names a card type. Reveal your hand and discard all cards of the chosen type.

cards.name: Winter Match

description.toWin: Draw cards 7 times while this card is in play. (Drawing multiple cards at a time counts once.)
description.prize: The winner may put a card from their discard pile into their hand.

cards.flavorText: 'I haven't been properly dry since August' — George Weasley

cards.name: Baby Acromantula
cards.description: When you play this card, search your deck. You may take a Baby Acromantula from your deck, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
cards.flavorText: '... I cannot deny them fresh meat, when it wanders so willingly into our midst.' — Aragog

cards.name: Cauldron Calamity
cards.description: To play this card, discard any number of your Potions Lessons from play. For each Potions Lesson discarded, do 2 damage to an opponent or to a Creature of your choice. (You may choose the same target multiple times.)

cards.name: Colin's Camera
cards.description: Before each of your turns, draw a card. Then all your opponents draw a card.

cards.name: Dodging the Bludger
cards.description: Do 2 damage to an opponent. Then draw a card. You may put a Quidditch Lesson from your hand into play.
cards.flavorText: '... he looped and swooped, spiraled, zigzagged, and rolled ... avoiding another fierce dive from the Bludger.'

cards.name: Dueling Practice
cards.description: Do 1 damage to an opponent. At the end of your turn, draw 2 cards.
cards.flavorText: ''I said disarm only!' Lockhart shouted in alarm over the heads of the battling crowd ...'

cards.name: Eat Slugs
cards.description: Do 2 damage to yourself. Then draw a card.
cards.flavorText: '... he gave an almighty belch and several slugs dribbled out of his mouth onto his lap.'

cards.name: Enemies of the Heir, Beware
cards.description: Choose an opponent and a card type. They reveal their hand, discard all cards of the chosen type, and take damage equal to the number of cards discarded in this way.

cards.name: Expelliarmus
cards.description: Choose 1 of your opponent's Items in play and discard it. If that item was a Wand, during their next turn, they can't use Actions to play Spells.
cards.flavorText: 'There was a dazzling flash of scarlet light and Lockhart was blasted off his feet ...'

cards.name: Forest Spider
cards.description: While this card is in your hand, it requires 1 less Power to play for each of your Spiders in play.
cards.flavorText: 'Spiders the size of carthorses, eight-eyed, eight-legged, black, hairy, gigantic.'

cards.name: Mimblewimble
cards.description: Do 4 damage to an opponent. During their next turn, they can't use their first Action to play Spells.

cards.name: Mis-Brewed Polyjuice
cards.description: Count the number of Characters an opponent has in play and in their discard pile. Do that much damage to that opponent. Then, choose 1 of their Characters in play. Until their next turn, that Character loses all abilities.

cards.name: Mortal Enemies
cards.description: Choose 1 of your Creatures in play and 1 of an opponent's Creatures in play. They do damage to each other.
cards.flavorText: 'Fawkes was soaring around its head, and the basilisk was snapping furiously at him with fangs long and thin as sabers ...'

cards.name: New Slytherin Seeker
cards.description: Do 5 damage to an opponent. If there is a Match in play, you may have that opponent choose 1 of their Creatures in play and discard it.
cards.flavorText: ''All right there, Scarhead?' yelled Malfoy, shooting underneath him as though to show off the speed of his broom.'

cards.name: Old Sock
cards.description: When you play this card, draw a card.
cards.flavorText: ''Got a sock,' said Dobby in disbelief. 'Master threw it, and Dobby caught it ...''

cards.name: Parseltongue
cards.description: Choose an opponent's Creature in play and return it to their hand. If you have Snake in play, discard your opponent's Creature instead.
cards.flavorText: 'A Parselmouth! You can talk to snakes!' — Ron Weasley

cards.name: Peskipiksi Pesternomi
cards.description: Discard all Wands in play.
cards.flavorText: 'It had absolutely no effect; one of the pixies seized his wand and threw it out of the window, too.'

cards.name: Petrifying Stare
cards.description: Choose an opponent's Character (other than their starting Character) or non-Rooster Creature in play. Shuffle that card into their deck.
cards.flavorText: 'But no one’s died — because no one looked it straight in the eye.' — Harry Potter

cards.name: Pre-Match Handshake
cards.description: Each player searches their deck. They may take a Lesson from their deck, reveal it, and put it into their hand. Each player shuffles their deck. Then you may put a Quidditch Lesson from your hand into play.
cards.flavorText: '... giving each other threatening stares and gripping rather harder than was necessary ...'

cards.name: Quaffle
cards.description: When you play this card, search your deck. You may take a Match from your deck, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Quidditch Confidence
cards.description: Play this card only if there is a Match in play. Trade total progress toward winning a Match with an opponent. Then do 4 damage to that opponent.

cards.name: Rooster
cards.description: Slytherin's Basilisk cannot be played.
cards.flavorText: '... the Basilisk flees only from the crowing of a rooster, which is fatal to it.'

cards.name: Sink Passageway
cards.description: Put a non-Healing Location from your discard pile into your hand.
cards.flavorText: 'It looked like an ordinary sink ... And then Harry saw it: Scratched on the side of one of the copper taps was a tiny snake.'

cards.name: Skele-Gro
cards.description: To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. Choose 3 different non-Healing cards in your discard pile. Your opponent chooses 1 of those cards. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

cards.name: Slower Brooms
cards.description: All cards with a Power cost (yours and your opponents') need 1 more Power to play. If you play this card and you already have a Broom in play, discard the old one.

cards.name: Substitute Cat
cards.description: Search your deck. You may take an Item or Creature with printed Power cost less than or equal to the number of Lessons you have in play, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Swish and Flick
cards.description: Put a Lesson from your discard pile into play.
cards.flavorText: 'Now, don't forget that nice wrist movement we've been practicing!' — Professor Filius Flitwick

cards.name: Wizard Duel
cards.description: Each player discards the top card of their deck. Do 8 damage to each player who discarded a card with the lowest printed Power cost. (Cards with no printed Power cost count as 0.)
